get_wed_top_text: GetWedd is an advanced wedding planner. Our service is designed to make the organization of this exciting day as easy as possible. You can set up your plan, manage the budget and get offers from service providers.
login_button_descr: Sign in with your account or with Facebook
___LOG_IN___: ___this is comment: texts for login form
send_password_reset_email: Provide your email and we'll send you instructions to restore your password.
invalid_credentials: Sorry, the credentials you have entered are not right. Try again.
___SIGN_UP___: ___this is comment: texts for registration form
new_plan_explanation:
GetWedd wedding plan is not just a list of services you need. This plan will connect you with the service providers, and you will receive offers for each of the chosen service. Choose the services you need, set up the budgets, add a description of each service, wishes and pictures, it'll help to providers understand what you need. After submitting, each service will turn into a job offer for relevant providers, which in turn will make offers to you.
*create plan is for registered users only
choose_attractions: Choose attractions you need from the list
plan_crated_success: Your wedding plan is successfully created!
choose_do_next: Please choose what to do next
clear_plan_confirm: You are about to clean your plan settings and get back basic settings. Are you sure you want to clean it?
login_to_add_plan_text: Please login to send your plan
plans_header_descr: Welcome to your wedding plan. Here you can manage your plan, add services, edit them, view offers from providers, chose relevant offers, and add providers which you choose not with our service. You will have a full list of services, providers and budgets that you need for your wedding.
empty_plans_message: You don't have wedding plan. Do you want to create one?

no_offers_yet: You didn't receive any offer yet
email_immediately_text: Get email for every offer immediately
email_once_text: Get concentrated offers in one email once in day
inbox_messages_email_every_text: Get email for every inbox message
inbox_messages_email_one_text: Get concentrated messages in one email once in day
sms_once_text: Get sms with number of new offers in one sms once in day
version_now_only_free_text: For this moment it is a pilot version of GetWedd application and there is onle FREE planavaliable.
plan_content_text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor
email_job_immediately: Get email for every new posted job immediately
email_job_once: Get concentrated new posted jobs in one email once in day
email_job_off: Turn off emails for posted jobs
sms_job_once: Get sms with number of new posted jobs in one sms once in day
sms_job_off: Turn off sms for posted jobs
sms_inbox_once: Get sms with number of new inbox messages in one sms once in day
sms_inbox_off: Turn off sms for inbox messages

name: Name
subject: Subject
edit_job_already_chose_text: You already chose a provider for this job and you can't change settings. You can cancel provider you already chose change settings of this job. In this case job will be avaliavle for offers again.
have_been_cancelled_text: You have been cancelled this job, you can restore it and job will be visible for providers again. After you canchange settings of this job.
edit_job_mobile_text: You can choose or cancel offer, add custom provider

about_registration_text: Create your account or Sign Up with Facebook to use our service.
create_wedding_plan_text: Choose services you need for your wedding. Set up budgets, add notes and images to explain to providers what exactly you need
manage_plan_text: Get offers from providers, write them messages, choose most relevant offers, add custom providers and manage your plan.
about_registration_text_provider: Create your account or Sign Up with Facebook to use our service.
about_setup_account_provider: Choose your services, add your portfolio and write something about you. We are in pilot, so it is totally FREE for now!
about_get_jobs_provider: Get list of relevant jobs, post your offers to clients and get your job with our service!

your_offer_has_been_sent_succesfully: Your offer has been sent succesfully

your_message_has_been_sent: Thanks! Your message has been sent
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please, try again later.
successfull_confirmation_account_text: You have successfully confirmed your account. Log in to start use GetWedd features!
